short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides better ClickFunnel Affiliate Commission Reporting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension lets you get a better understanding of your ClickFunnels affiliate reports.  Instead of trying to read through a hard to understand spreadsheet, CFTrends provides a nicer looking UI of your affiliate earnings.  You can sort and filter all your referrals and see who's still active under you or not.  Also provides graphs and charts so you can visually see your earnings over time.
